qas.question: What two performers were known as the team Abbott and Costello?
What military comedy did Bud Abbott and Lou Costello star in?
Along with Abbott and Costello and Edgar Bergen, what radio star appeared in Universal films?
What entertainment medium did Edgar Fields and W.C. Bergen come from?
Who starred in the 1914 Buck Privates comedy?

context: Universal could seldom afford its own stable of stars, and often borrowed talent from other studios, or hired freelance actors. In addition to Stewart and Dietrich, Margaret Sullavan, and Bing Crosby were two of the major names that made a couple of pictures for Universal during this period. Some stars came from <b3_0>radio<b3_0/>, including Edgar Bergen, <a2_0>W. C. Fields<a2_0/>, and the comedy team of <b5_0>Abbott and Costello<b5_0/> (<a0_0>Bud Abbott and Lou Costello<a0_0/>). Abbott and Costello's military comedy <a1_0><b4_0>Buck Privates<b4_0/><a1_0/> (1941) gave the former burlesque comedians a national and international profile.
